title: How to Remove Hair Using Organic Ganda Beroza

steps.title: Exfoliate your skin before removing hair.
steps.content: Exfoliate your skin before removing hair. Exfoliate your skin properly before removing the hair. Application of ganda beroza may cause skin irritation if you do not properly clean and remove dead surface skin beforehand. [2] X Trustworthy Source American Academy of Dermatology Professional organization made of over 20,000 certified dermatologists Go to source

steps.title: Wash your hands with soap and water.
steps.content: Wash your hands with soap and water. Only apply ganda beroza with clean hands. [3] X Trustworthy Source Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Main public health institute for the US, run by the Dept. of Health and Human Services Go to source

steps.title: Take a small amount of solid ganda beroza.
steps.content: Take a small amount of solid ganda beroza. This hair removal agent comes in a solid form. It's a sticky substance that will immediately stick on your fingers. (You may wish to wear disposable gloves before touching it if you don't like the feeling but it won't harm your skin.)

steps.title: Take a pinch of the hair removal agent.
steps.content: Take a pinch of the hair removal agent. Take about the same amount as you would when taking a pinch of salt.

steps.title: Apply the pinch of ganda beroza to your body hair.
steps.content: Apply the pinch of ganda beroza to your body hair. You can use this hair removal agent to remove unwanted hair from the armpits, arms, legs, and even your bikini area.

steps.title: Hold the unwanted hair between your thumb and index finger where you have already applied the ganda beroza.
steps.content: Hold the unwanted hair between your thumb and index finger where you have already applied the ganda beroza. Once the hair sticks to it, start pulling with force. It won't hurt if you pull it with force––do it too timidly and it will.

steps.title: Keep repeating the procedure until all unwanted hairs are removed.
steps.content: Keep repeating the procedure until all unwanted hairs are removed.

steps.title: Clean the skin gently.
steps.content: Clean the skin gently. Apply moisturizing lotion to the area of skin where the hair has been removed once the surface is clean.

steps.title: Remove ganda beroza from you fingers.
steps.content: Remove ganda beroza from you fingers. To remove any leftover ganda beroza from your fingers, rub your fingers against a pumice stone. This will take off any of the remaining substance.

steps.title: Wash your hands with soap and water.
steps.content: Wash your hands with soap and water. All done, you should now be hairless in the places you applied the ganda beroza too, all without much fuss. [4] X Trustworthy Source Mayo Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source
